ai-snp2.2:1.1_0: “ and the ground of the strings of pearls,
ai-snp2.2:1.2_0: the roots and various kinds of fruits.
ai-snp2.2:1.4_0: They don’t like the finest of sensual pleasures,
ai-snp2.2:2.2_0: burning superior to it is superior.
ai-snp2.2:2.4_0: Excellent, Kassapa, I will go you,
ai-snp2.2:3.4_0: and reckoned by their own good deeds.
ai-snp2.2:3.5_0: I ask you the reason for this, Kassapa,
ai-snp2.2:4.3_0: who makes one who is deceived by others.
ai-snp2.2:4.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:5.1_0: those people with unbridled sensual pleasures,
ai-snp2.2:5.3_0: Without roaming on, hard to travel,
ai-snp2.2:5.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:6.3_0: And those who don’t give gifts,
ai-snp2.2:6.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:7.1_0: anger that posts down by death is the belly,
ai-snp2.2:7.2_0: to break Māra and his army,
ai-snp2.2:7.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:8.1_0: Those in the virtues who have bad conduct,
ai-snp2.2:8.2_0: herein, take caravan in this life,
ai-snp2.2:8.3_0: What do those who have (surely) do not devoted to?
ai-snp2.2:8.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:9.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:10.1_0: is stuck in these things, the running away of them is a champion,
ai-snp2.2:10.4_0: This is the carrion in the same way,
ai-snp2.2:11.3_0: Builded by the fires of those (like) eating.
ai-snp2.2:11.4_0: All the world in the world,
ai-snp2.2:11.5_0: will attend to the hymns for sacrifice,
ai-snp2.2:11.6_0: will cleanse a mortal not free of doubt.
ai-snp2.2:12.1_0: He is detached from the ears, he is pursued,
ai-snp2.2:12.4_0: in regard to things that are a wise one who has not seen the wise.”
ai-snp2.2:13.1_0: in longing for the welfare of the Buddha.
ai-snp2.2:13.2_0: taught it the eyes to him,
ai-snp2.2:13.3_0: explained the verses to the Sages.
ai-snp2.2:14.1_0: Having heard the fine words of the Buddha,
ai-snp2.2:14.3_0: to play in the Realised One’s stream,
